name: Calm Before The Storm
storyline:
It's Caleb's sixth birthday. After setting up the house for the party and 5 hours pass its time to cut the cake.
Caleb is missing and now Caleb's Dad Sean is worried. He calls the police and the search starts. A storm is coming in three days. Sean hangs missing person posters, builds a storm shelter and looks for his child all in those three days.
summary:
It's Caleb's Sixth birthday.

It's time to cut the cake but Caleb isn't there.

Your mission is to find Caleb and protect him from the storm.
